trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle primitivo que trata do posicionamento e do dimensionamento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controle e dois <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> controles que são usados para definir um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: O controle de controle não tem um padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: Seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>é implementado como parte do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: A faixa tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controle e dois <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controles que são usados para alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>propriedade do controle acompanhar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um controle em um controle deslizante.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **Um controle em um controle deslizante**![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Pen") a tabela a seguir mostra as propriedades de controle e correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>propriedades que eles se associam.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade for alterada, a propriedade associada também será alterado.

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade de controle | propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| A tabela a seguir mostra as propriedades de controle e correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Propriedades ao qual eles vinculam quando um controle é parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controle e rastrear propriedades não são definidas explicitamente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade de controle | propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| A tabela a seguir mostra as propriedades de controle e correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>Propriedades ao qual eles vinculam quando um controle é parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle e rastrear propriedades não são definidas explicitamente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade de controle | propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Propriedades para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controla para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle, associar a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Propriedades para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controles do controle acompanhar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle é usado para rolar o conteúdo, o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controle é proporcional a porcentagem do conteúdo que aparece na área visível ou visor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um exemplo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controle que implementa um controle de acompanhar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Uma barra de rolagem com um controle de faixa**![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") o seguinte cálculo é usado para calcular o tamanho de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: tamanho de miniatura = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength o parâmetro viewportSize é o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de mínimos e máximo correspondem do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: O valor da expressão máximo-mínimo + viewportSize é o tamanho do conteúdo rolável.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>propriedade representa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>do controle quando o conteúdo é rolado na parte inferior.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>valor não é o mesmo que o comprimento ou a extensão do conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma explicação mais detalhada, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>de uma faixa em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>aumenta de cima para baixo ou da esquerda para a direita, dependendo da orientação do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>de uma faixa em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>aumento de baixo para cima ou da esquerda para a direita, dependendo da orientação do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a direção de aumento do valor, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>propriedade da faixa para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria o layout para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A área que é fornecida para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> a ser usado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> que diminui o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controle está em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controla do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>associar ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> que reduz a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> controlar quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é pressionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> controle com as configurações padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o filho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Especificar os elementos filho de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos filho são indexados na ordem em que as propriedades são definidas.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: O índice do filho.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> no índice especificado na lista de elementos filho de visual.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: O índice deve ser um número entre zero (0) e o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>propriedade menos um (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado é maior que o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>propriedade menos um (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> que aumenta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> classe</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controle está em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controla do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>associar ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> que aumenta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> controlar quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> é pressionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> controle com as configurações padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a direção do aumento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>é revertida da direção padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de IsDirectionReversed está definido como `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>locais do exchange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>valores aumentam da esquerda para a direita para ambos os horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>valores para vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>aumentar de cima para baixo, enquanto para vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>esses valores aumentam de baixo para cima.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define a propriedade IsDirectionReversed como `true`, inverte a direção de aumento do valor.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você implementar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle e você não definir explicitamente a propriedade IsDirectionReversed, associa a propriedade IsDirectionReversed para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <> </> *> e <> </> *> posições trocadas e a direção de aumento do valor é revertida; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o máximo possível <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controle está em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>controle e a propriedade máximo não for explicitamente definida, essa propriedade automaticamente associa com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: O valor máximo para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controle é equivalente ao tamanho do conteúdo rolável menos o tamanho do visor ou área de conteúdo visível.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o tamanho do conteúdo é 100 e o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>propriedade é 30, o valor da propriedade máximo é de 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Isso é verdadeiro porque o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controle corresponde à posição no conteúdo rolável que aparece na parte superior do visor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando o conteúdo é rolado para a parte mais inferior neste exemplo, 30 por cento do conteúdo ainda aparece no visor.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>que corresponde à parte superior do visor é 70, e o valor máximo é de 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra como o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>corresponde a uma posição de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> moves.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a alteração no <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> quando o <> </> *> move.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.target: A alteração no <> </> *> que corresponde ao deslocamento do <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> to a specified point along the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a distância entre o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> para um ponto especificado ao longo de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: O ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the and the specified pt value.
trans-unit.target: A distância entre o e especificado pt valor.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da parte do conteúdo rolável que está visível.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the ViewportSize is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade ViewportSize é usado para calcular o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>quando o ViewportSize não é <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os comentários para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir explicitamente o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>Crie um objeto que deriva da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>classe e fornecer substituições <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você implementar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controle e você não definir explicitamente a propriedade ViewportSize, associa a propriedade ViewportSize para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade ViewportSize um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controle que é implementado em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle é sempre <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, pois o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controle não altera o tamanho.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da área visível do conteúdo rolável.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, o que significa que o tamanho do conteúdo não está definido.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos filho de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Especificar os elementos filho de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos filho são indexados na ordem em que as propriedades são definidas.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro entre 0 e 2 que especifica o número de elementos filho no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.
